ksql: CREATE STREAM `wallbox_blink` WITH (VALUE_FORMAT='AVRO') AS SELECT PAYLOAD AS BLINK, REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 1) AS CLIENT_ID_KEY, AS_VALUE(REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 1)) AS CLIENT_ID, ROWTIME AS TIMESTAMP FROM `wallbox_source_stream` WHERE REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 3)='blink' AND REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 2)='out' PARTITION BY REGEXP_EXTRACT('(.*)/(.*)/(.*)', MQTT_TOPIC, 1);
